mapper.select: SELECT ofm.id, ofm.order_no, ofm.remark, ofm.`status`, ofm.real_amount, ofm.total_amount, ofm.transport_way, ofm.user_address, ofm.create_time, ifnull(ofm.transport_fee,0) transport_fee, shop.shop_name, cus.real_name customerName, uas.link_mobile1, uas.link_mobile2, dis.real_name distributorName FROM goods_order ofm left JOIN `user` cus on ofm.user_id =cus.id left join user_address uas on ofm.address_id=uas.id LEFT JOIN `user` dis on ofm.distributor_id=dis.id left join shop on ofm.shop_id = shop.id WHERE ofm.id=#{id}
